statements: SELECT * FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory WHERE category='Laptop';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS Total_Count FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT equipment_id, MAX(last_maintenance_date) AS Latest_Maintenance FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_name, category FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory WHERE category = 'Laptops' AND location LIKE '%NY%' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Headquarters';

SELECT equipment_name, category, location, last_maintenance_date FROM remote_work_equipment_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, category, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, category, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT equipment_name, category, technician_name FROM equipment_inventory JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, category, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT equipment_name, technician_name FROM equipment_inventory JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Corrective';

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_details FROM equipment_inventory INNER JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id WHERE equipment_inventory.quantity < 10 ORDER BY maintenance_logs.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE category='Computers';
SELECT id, name, location FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM equipment_categories WHERE category_id=2;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type='Repair' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE category = 'Computers'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, technician FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance'
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Room%'
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM equipment_categories
SELECT * FROM work_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, last_maintenance_date FROM work_equipment_inventory WHERE category='Tools';
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, category FROM work_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT employee_name, employee_email, department FROM employees WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT * FROM work_equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, category FROM work_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM equipment_categories;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND employee_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM work_equipment_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, name, category FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, location FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, name, category FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT e.name, e.department, a.assignment_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN assignments a ON e.id = a.employee_id;
SELECT m.id, m.equipment_id, m.maintenance_date, e.name as equipment_name FROM maintenance_logs m LEFT JOIN equipment e ON m.equipment_id = e.id;
SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(e.id) as total_equipment FROM categories c LEFT JOIN equipment e ON c.id = e.category GROUP BY c.category_name;
